name: Whatsapp-Chat Bot
description: An automated whatsapp chat bot that response to incoming messages with a pre-defined message. It also has a feature to send a message to a particular contact at a particular time. It can send buttons, imagesn location etc.

name: Q-A Chat Bot
description: An automated whatsapp chat bot that response to incoming questions with AI generated answer. A small replica of chatGPT.

name: Accessbility Testing Framework
description: Framework has been created to do Accessibility Testing for a demo website, and generate a detailed report which captures all the logs and issues.

name: True NR Holidays
description: A travel website for True NR Holidays, Indore. It has feature of booking trips and asking queries related to the travel packages.

name: Biometric Authentication
description: An POC for biometric authentication using fingerprint sensor and Face-Unlock . It uses Ionic framework to build the app and uses the fingerprint sensor to authenticate the user.

name: Sarcastic Cowboy
description: A blog website where users can read blogs, jokes, quotes. It has a feature of likes on the posts. It uses MongoDB to store the data and ExpressJS to create the REST API.

name: Portfolio
description: A portfolio website for Gaurav Singh

name: Premi's Book World
description: Portfolio website for author Dr. Subhash Chander Aima.

name: Spring Boot Rest API
description: A Rest API for a library management system. It uses Spring Boot to create the Rest API and Spring Data JPA to connect to the MySQL database.

name: Newz Bee
description: A news website where users can read news from different sources. It uses News API to fetch the news. News are categorized into different categories like Sports, Technology, Business etc.

name: Random Phone Number Generator API
description: An API that generates random phone numbers of every country at once. It uses NodeJS and ExpressJS to create the API.

name: Expense Tracker
description: A website where users can track their expenses. It uses React.js to build the website and TailwindCSS to style the website. It uses localStorage to store the data.

name: Guess The Number
description: A simple game where user has to guess the number between 1 to 20. It uses HTML, CSS and Javascript to build the game.

name: Weather Chrome Extension
description: A chrome extension that shows the weather of the current location of the user. It uses HTML, CSS and Javascript to build the extension.

name: Random Jokes Chrome Extension
description: A chrome extension that shows random jokes on the new tab. It uses HTML, CSS and Javascript to build the extension.

name: Car Rental System
description: A car rental system where users can book cars for a particular duration. It uses MongoDB to store the data and ExpressJS to create the REST API.
